GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
media: imx-jpeg: Align upwards buffer size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 9ae2d729de6350c53a06c57782751d84eb2c08d9, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit 2db16c6ed72ce644d5639b3ed15e5817442db4ba. For more details please see the references link.
